channel.title: CVE Feed for BdThemes -- Prime Slider – Addons For Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BdThemes -- Prime Slider – Addons For Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-30186|2024-08-06T16:36:34.158Z -- bdthemes -- prime%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BdThemes Prime Slider – Addons For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Prime Slider – Addons For Elementor: from n/a through 3.13.1.
